description: protocol schema generate by tagSchemaToJson from protocol

protocol_id.description: A unique ID for this protocol.

name.description: A short, descriptive name for the protocol that need not be unique.

description.description: A general description of the protocol.

core.description: type and schema for this object

pdf.description: A filename of a PDF containing the details of the protocol.

retail_name.description: The retail name of the kit used. e.g SureCell WTA 3' Library Prep Kit

type.description: The type of protocol. Ideally an EFO term.

title: protocol
